scripts.patch: npm version patch && cd node_modules/app-framework && node scripts/build
scripts.minor: npm version minor && cd node_modules/app-framework && node scripts/build
scripts.major: npm version major && cd node_modules/app-framework && node scripts/build
scripts.deploy: node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/prepareFirebase && firebase login && firebase deploy && node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/cleanupFirebase
scripts.backup: node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/prepareFirebase && firebase login && firebase database:get / >databaseBackup.json && node node_modules/app-framework/scripts/cleanupFirebase
